Parametric tests for Multiple ComparisonÂ¶

ANOVA tests

anova_test(*args) Performs a 1-way ANOVA.
anova_within_test(*args) Performs a 1-way ANOVA within cases.

Post-hoc tests

bonferroni_test(pivots, n)
